author: bago
msg: Code provided by Ajay Chitre. I just renamed it to Retry (we never have the Mailet postfix in our mailets) and removed generics and java5 "for" loop because we're still on java4 compliance.

author: arobinson74
msg: Merge of revision 699496 for bug TRINIDAD-1086

author: arobinson74
msg: When a managed-bean has name 'tree' and has a managed reference, things stop working with the RI. I am changing the bean 'tree' to 'demoTree' as a work-around. I will try to reproduce it with a test case and open an RI bug.
